attributes.additional_details: my children and a lot of parents have told me their kid come home complaining of hunger and the free school meal they receive is not enough for eg 1 slice of pizza or 1 wrap
attributes.background: quality of school meals need to change

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about school meals, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government publishes healthy eating standards for school meals, which must be met by schools and academies in England: https://www.gov.uk/school-meals-healthy-eating-standards

We could accept a petition calling for changes to these standards, or for a review of the quality of school meals being provided in England, if either of those are things you would like to happen.
